title: Can't Connect to the login queue
body: I'm not sure if it's due to maintenance, but I am currently unable to log into the NA Client. I looked at the service tracker and it shows all green for NA. Nothing has changed on my PC or Internet between yesterday and today, so I'm not sure why I cannot connect. Anyone else having this issue?

replies.body: Currently I'm not seeing any server issues, but definitely hit me back up in a reply if any of you are still having troubles getting logged in and I can look over your accounts to see what might have happened!

It's been 6 days of the same shit for me. Type out my info, press login, authenticating.... 5 minutes later "Sorry, there was an error connecting to the login server..." and repeat the cycle of bleach to my eyes.
I'm still having this issue. it's been over a week. using the hextech repair tool and everything and it still hasnt fixed it

If you're still having this connection issues, I'd recommend running through your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure you're able to get a solid connection with our servers.

I've checked the network settings. I'm able to get a solid connection . i've also run through the hextech tool multiple times. not sure why this is suddenly a problem. alot of people online have been noting it too? Has riot seen a dip in usage and logins??
Does it fail at authentication? Mine hasn't been able to authenticate in over a week. Riot blames my ISP and vice versa.
EVERYONE, I just ran the hextech repair tool and it fixed the issues. Try it out and see if it works for you.
the tool didn't do anything for me
What parts of the tool did you use, I've run the HRT, but it doesn't seem to fix anything
what is it saying exactly for everyone else
I've been having the same issue.
I just continued trying to log in, eventually got in. Dont know if its fixed, or just lucky. (Didnt run the repair)

Yeah just logged in to say I am also experiencing the same issue. Closed and re-opened the client and ensured my internet connection is good.

EDIT: I didn't run the tool but I was able to get in after trying again.

Same, I just woke up and tried logging on. Came to the website to post and see whats up, got the same error logging into the website. After trying a few times it finally let me in though.

Now its telling me my username/password is incorrect despite LITERALLY just using it to log in on the website lol.
should work now

Yup. Same.

EDIT - I was now able to log in.
Same problem here.
same.
Same issue here
Same here, can't log in.
I cant log in either
